results.name: Sum of divisors of those numbers n such that n and n+1 have the same sum of divisors.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10135 (from the b-file at A002961; terms 1..4804 from T. D. Noe)
mathematica: DivisorSigma[1,#]&/@SequencePosition[DivisorSigma[1,Range[280000]],{x_,x_}][[All,1]] (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 21 2017 *)
results.author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Jan 11 2000
